name: Oof McBrewster's Haunted House Adventure -- NES
name_original: Oof McBrewster's Haunted House Adventure -- NES
description:
Oof, if you're reading this, I'm dead.  -- Uncle Crodie

Oof McBrewster receives a letter from his dear Uncle Crodie, only to learn that his uncle has died, leaving behind a haunted mansion, a friggin’ fortune, and a call to adventure for our fearless hero.

Oof McBrewster’s Haunted House Adventure is a brand new video game for the classic Nintendo Entertainment System console.

  • Navigate the dangers within Crodie’s mansion
  • Avoid deadly traps and dangerous creatures
  • Arm yourself well with a slingshot and err… coffee
  • Find those scattered notebook pages
  • Go get that fortune!
  • Most importantly… Don’t get GOT!

This game was developed for the original 8-bit NES Console.  It is available here as a ROM file playable via emulators such as Mesen (tested and verified 100% compatible), or playable on the original hardware via a Flash Cart such as PowerPack or Everdrive.

Oof McBrewster's Haunted House Adventure -- Demo rom -- a Demo of the game is available as well, if you'd like to verify that it works with your preferred emulator and/or hardware, or would just like a hands on with the game to make sure it's your kind of game before handing over that hard earned couple of bucks.


What's included:

  • Rom
  • PDF of the instruction Manual
  • Printable copy of the Letter from Uncle Crodie
  • Printable copy of the cart's label
  • Printable copy of the box art (from all sides)
  • Various extra art files

Physical copies of the game are also available via private sale. Visit oofmbrewster.com for details, as well as additional info, pics, screens, and videos.
